title: [cp2k@7.1] Failed to execute the self-test case.
body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->
Hello,I meet a question about [cp2k@7.1] Failed to execute the self-test case.
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
[root@centos8 ~]#spack install -y openmpi@4.0.5 python@3.8.5
[root@centos8 ~]#spack install -y --keep-stage cp2k@7.1 smm=blas openmp=false
[root@centos8 ~]#spack cd cp2k@7.1 smm=blas openmp=false
[root@centos8 spack-src]#spack load cp2k@7.1 smm=blas openmp=false
[root@centos8 spack-src]#spack load openmpi@4.0.5 python@3.8.5
[root@centos8 spack-src]#source ../spack-build-env.txt
[root@centos8 spack-src]#export OMPI_ALLOW_RUN_AS_ROOT=1
[root@centos8 spack-src]#export OMPI_ALLOW_RUN_AS_ROOT_CONFIRM=1
[root@centos8 spack-src]# make -j10 ARCH=linux-centos8-aarch64-gcc VERSION=popt test
Discovering programs ...
cd /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-cp2k-7.1-es7yeqm3jxfy7l353jj2zdu4mepc6g64/spack-src/regtesting/linux-centos8-aarch64-gcc/popt; /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-cp2k-7.1-es7yeqm3jxfy7l353jj2zdu4mepc6g64/spack-src/tools/regtesting/do_regtest -quick -arch linux-centos8-aarch64-gcc -version popt -cp2kdir ../../../
```
